name: Prison Escape Alcatraz 3D Game
description:
“Some birds are not meant to be caged!” Play jailbreak missions to escape from hell. Get ready to break maximum security prison in this newest game. Hard time is over in rehabilitation center it’s time for parole from prisoner life. Show brutal attacking skills to knockdown police officer and make wayout with your jail inmates.

Rival business tycoon conspired to keep you locked up in criminal rehabilitation center. He bribed jail warden who sentenced you with illegal notorious criminals for fake crime case. Plan escape from maximum security jail with your fellow cellmates. Discover weak spot in lockup for escaping prison life. Bribe security guard to run from the escape proof facility. Use fist or baseball bat to smash security camera feed. Watchout for laser motion doors of control tower. Shoot cops to get key to break prison. Escaping maximum security won’t be hard as much as getting back in jail. Takedown police officer by beating harshly and badly with tools or arms.

Prison break mission is not over yet! Shoot police officers! It’s time to get revenge from reinforcement for the punishment and torture. Get your inmates out of jail & free bandits from inescapable prison in this amazing RPG style simulation game. The escape mission begun help bad guys and thugs prisoners with mastermind plan. Use stealth and sneak melee attack to kill corrupt cops. Criminal transport for life sentence and punishment get most wanted killers out to revenge your rival tycoon. Watchout for laser camera, sniper guards & motion sensor laser doors. Pick lock doors and attempt to flee your cell inmates in this crazy prison escaping game.

Game Features:
Challenging missions in two modes: Jail Escape Mode & Survival Mode
Weapons include time bomb, baseball bat, Electric stun gun and rifle
Smooth controls for sneak and stealth walk or shooting enemies
Advanced security with laser camera surveillance
Realistic inside jail environment with cops and criminals
High quality 3D graphics and thrilling sounds


Download Prison Escape 3D simulator game for epic jail break adventures. Give us your feedback in the reviews section and help us improve our games.
